Posts.Content: Hi everyone I went to the doctors yesterday and was confirmed I had a lump in my left breast and I also have some kind of growth on my arm which I have to have a biopsy for. I haven't stoped crying since yesterday, the doctor said my appointment will be in 3-4 weeks I live in North Wales.Â  She said she couldnt feel anything under my arm and in my right breast but I'm still so worry ed xxx
Posts.Title: Lump confirmed on left breast and biopsy on my arm.scared stiff x...
